content.raw:
This is super nitpicky, but I like to align the split quotes with the string that they split off from. E.g.

```
message(WARNING "Here is the first line of a message "
                "and here is some more of the message")
```

Also, there's a space at the end of the first split and the beginning of the second split, so we may want to remove one of those.

These would be completely superficial changes, though, so I approve of this PR whether or not these suggestions are taken.

This is super nitpicky, but I like to align the split quotes with the string that they split off from. E.g.

message(WARNING "Here is the first line of a message "
                "and here is some more of the message")

Also, there's a space at the end of the first split and the beginning of the second split, so we may want to remove one of those.

These would be completely superficial changes, though, so I approve of this PR whether or not these suggestions are taken.
